name: Pet the Fumo
description:
PET THE FUMO

The Hakurei Shrine has been hit by inconveniences once again: the "incident" of today involves a giant plush falling on it. Unable to find what youkai is behind this, Reimu came up with an idea that will do for now: since a flock of smelly weirdos with similar but way smaller plushies has found its way to the Shrine after this, she's decided to get some donations by selling petting privileges. This has been the best business decision she's ever made.

Pet the Fumo is a very simple clicker with one objective in mind: pet your fumo as much as possible. Recruit various helpers to help you make this as successful as possible, for the sake of the fumo and the sake of the shrine's financial business.

Press left click to Pat.
Press right click to change Fumo (up-to 16 fumos unlockable!)
"Final objective" is to buy one ZUN.

CREDITS:
Game and sprites by yours truly Mafkumin
Music by Moventesi (https://twitter.com/moventesi)
Background by ansimuz: https://ansimuz.itch.io/mountain-dusk-parallax-background
